üîπ **Forms:**
| Proximity | Masculine singular | Feminine singular | Masculine plural | Feminine plural |
|------------|--------------------|-------------------|------------------|-----------------|
| Near (here) | este | esta | estos | estas |

üí° **Usage rules:**
